channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 一小群 FTX 交易公司的客户要求这家破产的加密货币公司支付数亿美元，声称三枚被称为 "山姆币 "的数字代币理应得到赔偿
item.description:
A small group of FTX Trading customers are demanding hundreds of millions of dollars from the bankrupt crypto firm, claiming that three digital tokens known as “Sam Coins” deserve a payout https://t.co/A31hYbTVNQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国房价增速为 2022 年以来最快，购房者压力增大
item.description:
Home-price growth in the US accelerated at the fastest rate since 2022, increasing pressure on buyers https://t.co/s66fptAaKb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 印度第二大私人贷款机构 ICICI 银行正面临一些小股东对其经纪部门退市提议的反弹
item.description:
India’s second-largest private lender ICICI Bank is facing backlash from some minority shareholders over the proposed delisting of its broking unit https://t.co/qSEkvxusb5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 自 2023 年开始以来，Nvidia 的上涨如此突然而强劲，以至于即使是看涨的投资者也开始担心其股价还能有多大的上涨空间。
item.description:
Nvidia’s runup since the start of 2023 has been so sudden and strong that even bullish investors are raising concerns about how much room its shares have left to run. https://t.co/0IyhON0Wbp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 2 月份，美国工厂的耐用品新订单三个月来首次出现增长，这表明企业对经济发展方向持乐观态度。
item.description:
New orders placed with US factories for durable goods rose in February for the first time in three months, suggesting firms are somewhat optimistic about the direction of the economy. https://t.co/1R8kqorw4Q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国非市场食品杂货商 Ocado 和 Waitrose 重新夺回市场份额，因为通胀缓解为它们提供了打折空间
item.description:
Upmarket UK grocers Ocado and Waitrose regain market share as easing inflation gave them room to offer discounts https://t.co/RjD7c1mTqy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥坍塌，马里兰州宣布进入紧急状态。请关注我们免费阅读的实时博客，了解最新消息
item.description:
Maryland declares a state of emergency after Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge collapses. Follow our free-to-read live blog for the latest updates https://t.co/E6DiEMNVpM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 加拿大央行的二号官员表示，解决加拿大生产率低下的问题，将在不刺激通胀的情况下实现更多的经济增长。加拿大央行二号官员称，解决该国岌岌可危的生产力问题将在不刺激通胀的情况下实现更多经济增长
item.description:
The Bank of Canada’s no. 2 official says fixing the country’s faltering productivity would allow for more economic growth without stoking inflation https://t.co/X9oin8jclj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: @mburtonmetals 写道：由于价格暴跌迫使西方竞争对手缩减开支，中国矿产商开始关注电池金属的并购。
item.description:
Chinese miners are eyeing M&A in battery metals as plunging prices force Western rivals to cut back, writes @mburtonmetals https://t.co/2EObRed8Jb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴尔的摩的一座主要通勤桥在被一艘集装箱船撞击后坍塌，导致车辆坠入水中，东海岸最重要的港口之一有可能陷入混乱。关注实时更新 ⤵️
item.description:
A major commuter bridge in Baltimore collapsed after being rammed by a container ship, causing vehicles to plunge into the water and threatening chaos at one of the most important ports on the East Coast

Follow live updates ⤵️https://t.co/JV84Ot4KE7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴尔的摩大桥垮塌引发了一场疯狂的救援行动。未来几天，这将给商务、通勤和假日旅行者带来棘手的问题
item.description:

item.title: 自宽松货币时代初期以来，全球高等级信贷市场的质量从未如此之好

item.title: 冰岛 3 月份通胀加速，与北欧国家最大银行的预期背道而驰，并有可能推迟央行开始降息的时间

item.title: 威廉-鲁托总统希望肯尼亚经济在其任期结束前实现预算平衡，这将是肯尼亚自二十年前出现财政盈余以来的首次平衡
item.description:
President William Ruto wants Kenya's economy running a balanced budget before the end of his term, which would make it a first since a fiscal surplus two decades ago https://t.co/QhzwJ1yFI9

item.title: 六个月的变化真大：彭博社对经济学家的最新月度调查预计，美国今年的经济增长率为 2.2%，是 9 月份预期的两倍多。
item.description:
What a difference six months can make: Bloomberg’s latest monthly survey of economists projects US growth at 2.2% this year — more than twice as fast as anticipated in September https://t.co/KtXMh68eOp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 福林在新兴市场货币中涨幅居前，因为市场预期匈牙利央行将放慢降息步伐

item.title: 花旗集团英国首席执行官表示，该银行的管理层改革已经结束，现在准备 "有选择性地 "招聘人员。
item.description:
Citigroup’s UK CEO says the bank’s management overhaul is over and it’s now ready to “selectively” hire https://t.co/vL45f8jHrP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 法国奥迪斯公司（Altice France）戏剧性的一周引发了激烈的债券交易，至少 20 亿美元的相关债务易手
item.description:
A dramatic week for Altice France sparked intense trading in its bonds, with at least $2 billion of debt linked to the firm changing hands https://t.co/pR9xuUYuLP

item.title: 消息人士称，阿里巴巴取消了旗下菜鸟物流部门的首次公开募股（IPO）计划，搁置了备受瞩目的首次公开募股，该计划本可筹集超过 10 亿美元的资金。
item.description:
Alibaba is calling off an IPO for its Cainiao logistics arm, shelving a much-anticipated debut that could have raised more than $1 billion, sources say https://t.co/4gxmMTxEQs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024
